ECS 036C.title: Data Structures, Algorithms, & Programming
ECS 036C.description: Design and analysis of data structures for a variety of applications; trees, heaps, searching, sorting, hashing, and graphs. Extensive programming.

ECS 150.title: Operating Systems & System Programming
ECS 150.description: Basic concepts of operating systems and system programming. Processes and interprocess communication/synchronization; virtual memory, program loading and linking; file and I/O subsystems; utility programs. Study of a real operating system.

ECS 162.title: Web Programming
ECS 162.description: Technical aspects of building websites, including both server-side and client-side software development.
